content: सौत्र {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (त्री|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [सूत्र-अण्] {@--1@} Belonging to or having a thread or string. {@--2@} Belonging to, mentioned, occurring or declared in, a Sūtra <ab>q. v.</ab> --त्रः {@--1@} A Brāhmaṇa. {@--2@} An artificial root occurring in grammatical Sūtras which can not be conjugated like a regular verb, but is used only to form derivative words.
